h2_title: All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong
content: **This trophy has a few aspects to it. Firstly, you'll need to speak to the old man that gives you the gourd in Chapter 1, Chapter 2, and Chapter 4. Exhaust all dialogue each time.**
promot:

The content is as follows:
**This trophy has a few aspects to it. Firstly, you'll need to speak to the old man that gives you the gourd in Chapter 1, Chapter 2, and Chapter 4. Exhaust all dialogue each time.**
